# ðŸ“Š Visualization Example

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Example Data
x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]

# Create plot
plt.plot(x, y, marker="o")
plt.title("Simple Line Plot")
plt.xlabel("X Axis")
plt.ylabel("Y Axis")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
